verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about מוֹעֲדֵ֣י <S%H4150><s%> unto them [Concerning] the feasts יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תִּקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> which ye shall proclaim אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִקְרָאֵ֣י <S%H4744><s%> convocations קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [to be] holy אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> are these הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like מוֹעֲדָֽי׃ <S%H4150><s%> [even] these [are] my feasts

שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> Six יָמִים֮ <S%H3117><s%> days תֵּעָשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> be done מְלָאכָה֒ <S%H4399><s%> shall work וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> but the seventh שַׁבַּ֤ת <S%H7676><s%> [is] the sabbath שַׁבָּתוֹן֙ <S%H7677><s%> of rest מִקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> convocation קֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> an holy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> no work לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ye shall do שַׁבָּ֥ת <S%H7676><s%> [therein] it [is] the sabbath הִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מֽוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4186><s%> in all your dwellings פ

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מוֹעֲדֵ֣י <S%H4150><s%> These [are] the feasts יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִקְרָאֵ֖י <S%H4744><s%> convocations קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [even] holy אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תִּקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> which ye shall proclaim אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּמוֹעֲדָֽם׃ <S%H4150><s%> in their seasons

בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <S%H7223><s%> [day] of the first בְּאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֛ר <S%H6240><s%> teen לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> at הָעַרְבָּ֑יִם <S%H6153><s%> at even פֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> passover לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

וּבַחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> teen יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the same month הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> of the same חַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> [is] the feast הַמַּצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days מַצּ֥וֹת <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> ye must eat

בַּיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> In the first מִקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> convocation קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> ye shall have an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָכֶ֑ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> no servile לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> ye shall do

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7126><s%> But ye shall offer אִשֶּׁ֛ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִי֙ <S%H7637><s%> in the seventh מִקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> convocation קֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [is] an holy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> no servile לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> ye shall do פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> unto them When ye be come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I am נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> which I give לָכֶ֔ם וּקְצַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7114><s%> unto you and shall reap אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְצִירָ֑הּ <S%H7105><s%> the harvest וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> thereof then ye shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹ֛מֶר <S%H6016><s%> a sheaf רֵאשִׁ֥ית <S%H7225><s%> of the firstfruits קְצִירְכֶ֖ם <S%H7105><s%> of your harvest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest

וְהֵנִ֧יף <S%H5130><s%> And he shall wave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹ֛מֶר <S%H6016><s%> the sheaf לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֑ם <S%H7522><s%> to be accepted מִֽמָּחֳרַת֙ <S%H4283><s%> for you on the morrow הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> after the sabbath יְנִיפֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5130><s%> shall wave הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> the priest

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֕ם <S%H6213><s%> And ye shall offer בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הֲנִֽיפְכֶ֖ם <S%H5130><s%> when ye wave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹ֑מֶר <S%H6016><s%> the sheaf כֶּ֣בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> an he lamb תָּמִ֧ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first שְׁנָת֛וֹ <S%H8141><s%> year לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וּמִנְחָתוֹ֩ <S%H4503><s%> And the meat offering שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> thereof [shall be] two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֜ים <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals סֹ֣לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour בְּלוּלָ֥ה <S%H1101><s%> mingled בַשֶּׁ֛מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil אִשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD רֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֑חַ <S%H5207><s%> [for] a sweet וְנִסְכֹּ֥ה <S%H5262><s%> and the drink offering יַ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> thereof [shall be] of wine רְבִיעִ֥ת <S%H7243><s%> the fourth הַהִֽין׃ <S%H1969><s%> [part] of an hin

וְלֶחֶם֩ <S%H3899><s%> neither bread וְקָלִ֨י <S%H7039><s%> nor parched corn וְכַרְמֶ֜ל <S%H3759><s%> nor green ears לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> neither תֹֽאכְל֗וּ <S%H398><s%> And ye shall eat עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> that עֶ֙צֶם֙ <S%H6106><s%> same הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> until הֲבִ֣יאֲכֶ֔ם <S%H935><s%> ye have brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבַּ֖ן <S%H7133><s%> an offering אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> unto your God חֻקַּ֤ת <S%H2708><s%> [it shall be] a statute עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> for ever לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> throughout your generations בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מֹשְׁבֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4186><s%> in all your dwellings ס

וּסְפַרְתֶּ֤ם <S%H5608><s%> And ye shall count לָכֶם֙ מִמָּחֳרַ֣ת <S%H4283><s%> unto you from the morrow הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> after the sabbath מִיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> from the day הֲבִ֣יאֲכֶ֔ם <S%H935><s%> that ye brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹ֖מֶר <S%H6016><s%> the sheaf הַתְּנוּפָ֑ה <S%H8573><s%> of the wave offering שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שַׁבָּת֖וֹת <S%H7676><s%> sabbaths תְּמִימֹ֥ת <S%H8549><s%> complete תִּהְיֶֽינָה׃ <S%H1961><s%> shall be

עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> Even unto מִֽמָּחֳרַ֤ת <S%H4283><s%> the morrow הַשַּׁבָּת֙ <S%H7676><s%> sabbath הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ת <S%H7637><s%> after the seventh תִּסְפְּר֖וּ <S%H5608><s%> shall ye number חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֛ם <S%H7126><s%> and ye shall offer מִנְחָ֥ה <S%H4503><s%> meat offering חֲדָשָׁ֖ה <S%H2319><s%> a new לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

מִמּוֹשְׁבֹ֨תֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H4186><s%> of your habitations תָּבִ֣יאּוּ ׀ <S%H935><s%> Ye shall bring out לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> loaves תְּנוּפָ֗ה <S%H8573><s%> wave שְׁ֚תַּיִם <S%H8147><s%> two שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> of two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֔ים <S%H6241><s%> tenth deals סֹ֣לֶת <S%H5560><s%> they shall be of fine flour תִּהְיֶ֔ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become חָמֵ֖ץ <S%H2557><s%> with leaven תֵּאָפֶ֑ינָה <S%H644><s%> they shall be baken בִּכּוּרִ֖ים <S%H1061><s%> [they are] the firstfruits לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֣ם <S%H7126><s%> And ye shall offer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Along הַלֶּ֗חֶם <S%H3899><s%> with the bread שִׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H7651><s%> seven כְּבָשִׂ֤ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs תְּמִימִם֙ <S%H8549><s%> without blemish בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the first שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year וּפַ֧ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> of the herd אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and one וְאֵילִ֣ם <S%H352><s%> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two יִהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> are to be a עֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> they shall be [for] a burnt offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וּמִנְחָתָם֙ <S%H4503><s%> with their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֔ם <S%H5262><s%> and their drink offerings אִשֵּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> [even] an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> of sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֛ם <S%H6213><s%> Then ye shall sacrifice שְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וּשְׁנֵ֧י <S%H8147><s%> and two כְבָשִׂ֛ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year לְזֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> for a sacrifice שְׁלָמִֽים׃ <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings

וְהֵנִ֣יף <S%H5130><s%> shall wave הַכֹּהֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֹתָ֡ם <S%H853><s%> עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> with לֶ֨חֶם <S%H3899><s%> them with the bread הַבִּכּוּרִ֤ים <S%H1061><s%> of the firstfruits תְּנוּפָה֙ <S%H8573><s%> [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> with the two כְּבָשִׂ֑ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs קֹ֛דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> they shall be holy יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD לַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> for the priest

וּקְרָאתֶ֞ם <S%H7121><s%> And ye shall proclaim בְּעֶ֣צֶם ׀ <S%H6106><s%> on the selfsame הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this מִֽקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> [that] it may be an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> have לָכֶ֔ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> no servile לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> unto you ye shall do חֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> [therein it shall be] a statute עוֹלָ֛ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מוֹשְׁבֹ֥תֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4186><s%> in all your dwellings לְדֹרֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> throughout your generations

וּֽבְקֻצְרְכֶ֞ם <S%H7114><s%> And when ye reap אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְצִ֣יר <S%H7105><s%> the harvest אַרְצְכֶ֗ם <S%H776><s%> of your land לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תְכַלֶּ֞ה <S%H3615><s%> thou shalt not make clean riddance פְּאַ֤ת <S%H6285><s%> of the corners שָֽׂדְךָ֙ <S%H7704><s%> of thy field בְּקֻצְרֶ֔ךָ <S%H7114><s%> when thou reapest וְלֶ֥קֶט <S%H3951><s%> any gleaning קְצִירְךָ֖ <S%H7105><s%> of thy harvest לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְלַקֵּ֑ט <S%H3950><s%> neither shalt thou gather לֶֽעָנִ֤י <S%H6041><s%> them unto the poor וְלַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> and to the stranger תַּעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> thou shalt leave אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying
